name: Weltschmerz-behind the scenes
description:
Hellen is a woman who has a special relationship with her paintings, being able to mix the reality with them. Something happened to her that made her forget her recent past.

You will have to solve the puzzles using the paintings to help her remember what happened in the Miller's house.

This game made by 4D studio:

Astists:  Binrong Zheng, Roger Serra, Débora Preciado

Programmers: Aniol Batallé, Iyán Caldevilla, Daniel Gómez, David Serrat, Jose Suarez

Music: Quim Prunés  (KDMstudio)

Voices: Aiden Cairns, Clara Terencia
